reviewText: A good job was done in transfering the film to DVD. I had forgotten why we use to sleep through the training films when I was a recruit in the Navy but the product was as advertised and well done. I know it will mean a lot to my father because he can find very little about LCVPs and even though LCMs are the stars, there are some good action shots of LCVPs in action in the first of the 3 training films include on the DVD.
